children.text: On the top floors, this room includes plush bathrobes, a minibar, tea and upgraded coffee-making facilities, and free toiletries in the private bathroom.

Room Amenities
- Minibar
- Bathtub
- Safe
- Pay-per-view channels
- Telephone
- Air conditioning
- Hairdryer
- Iron
- Bathrobe
- Radio
- Desk
- Ironing facilities
- Free toiletries
- Toilet
- Video
- Bathroom
- Heating
- Satellite channels
- Cable channels
- Carpeted
- Interconnecting room(s) available
- Flat-screen TV
- Wake-up service
- Alarm clock
- iPod dock
- Coffee machine
- City view
- Towels
- Linens
- High chair
If canceled or modified up to 1 day before the date of arrival, no fee will be charged. If canceled or modified later or in case of no-show, 100 percent of the first night will be charged.
100 percent of the first night may be charged anytime after booking. The hotel reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.

All children are welcome. Up to two children under 17 years stay free of charge when using existing beds. Any additional older children or adults are charged USD 20 per person per night when using existing beds. Any additional children under 2 years stay free of charge in a crib. The maximum number of cribs in a room is 1. 

Pets are allowed on request. Charges may apply. 

WiFi is available in the hotel rooms and costs USD 14.95 per 24 hours. 

Private parking is available on site (reservation is not needed) and costs USD 55 per day. 

When booking more than 9 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply. 

Please note: The 24-hour cancellation policy goes into effect after 12:00 the day prior to arrival. This does not apply to non-refundable or special conditions policies. Omni San Francisco offers discounts on parking each weekend. Please contact Omni San Francisco for more information. Guests must join Omni's Select Guest program in order to receive free WiFi. Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
* Pricing, taxes & fees, room description, cancellation policy and booking information are provided by Booking.com
